abstract: Creates a locale-aware attributed string representation from a date value.
overview:
## Return Value

An attributed string representation of the date.

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/ISO8601FormatStyle] [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FormatStyle/format(_:)] instance method generates an attributed string from the provided date. Once you create a style, you can use it to format dates multiple times.

For an example of formatting multiple dates into plain strings, see [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FormatStyle/format(_:)].

# format(_:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a locale-aware attributed string representation from a date value.

## Declaration

```swift
func format(_ value: Date) -> AttributedString
```

## Parameters

- **value**: The date to format.

## Return Value

An attributed string representation of the date.

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/ISO8601FormatStyle] [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FormatStyle/format(_:)] instance method generates an attributed string from the provided date. Once you create a style, you can use it to format dates multiple times.

For an example of formatting multiple dates into plain strings, see [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FormatStyle/format(_:)].
title: format(_:)
